snippet.title: This Bed We Made | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1243850/This_Bed_We_Made/
JOIN THE COMMUNITY: https://t.co/JqkXfLdb4t 

This Bed We Made is a third-person narrative mystery game in which you play as Sophie, an inquisitive maid in a 1950s hotel. As she carries out her duties, she uncovers the most intimate secrets of the hotel's guests through their unsettling possessions, leading her to discover the eerie mystery that binds them.
